title: Trump Deadline, Jackie Walters Interview, R. Kelly, iHeart Living Room Concert and more.
itunes:title: Trump Deadline, Jackie Walters Interview, R. Kelly, iHeart Living Room Concert and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are The Baddest Radio Show in the Land. Fool #2 has his opinion about Trump and Easter. Dr. Jackie stops by to help with intimacy during quarantine, plus more. R. Kelly fears COVID-19 and wants to live with his girlfriend. We talk about Essential and Non-Essential items. Get ready for the iHeart Living Room Concert for America. Steve started the show with a parachute and today in Closing Remarks, he brings it back and wraps up the show. We'll see you Monday morning!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
